description: The Greek God of Sky and Thunder and The Ruler of Mount Olympus. Zeus is a very demanding man who gets what he wants with his power and words. Although seeming forceful and tyrannical, he keeps the future of humanity and gods in mind. For this reason he has established the very place the whole story takes palce in - and has summoned (or forced) everybody in, to learn about humanity from Yui.
name: Zeus Keraunos
